data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Žilinský to exponentially multiply disciples.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Žilinský, Slovakia
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Žilinský words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Spirit, disrupt complacency in the 10,123 believers living in the state of Žilinský. Remind them you are coming soon.
data.verse: Therefore, stay awake, for you do not know on what day your Lord is coming.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 10,123 believers in Žilinský that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Jew, Slovak-speaking people.
Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the state of Žilinský, Slovakia.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Žilinský, Slovakia.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

data.prayer: Father, we ask for 138 new simple churches in the state of Žilinský, Slovakia. Place a simple church in every community of the 692,300 people living here.
data.verse: And blessed be His glorious name forever; And may the whole earth be filled with His glory. Amen, and Amen.

location.name: Žilinský
location.cities_list: Žilina, Martin, Liptovský Mikuláš, Ružomberok, Čadca
